mapper.select: SELECT cartNo, userId, p.prodName, prodPrice, p.prodThumbnail, prodSize, amount FROM product p, cart c WHERE cartNO = #{cartNO} AND userId = #{userId} AND p.prodName = c.prodName ORDER BY cartNo DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET amount = #{amount} WHERE cartNo = #{cartNo} AND userId = #{userId} AND prodName = #{prodName} AND prodSize = #{prodSize}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO cart USING dual ON (userId = #{userId} AND prodName = #{prodName} AND prodSize = #{prodSize}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET amount = amount + #{amount} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (cartNo, userId, prodName, prodSize, amount) VALUES ((SELECT NVL2(MAX(cartNo), MAX(cartNo)+1, 1) FROM cart), #{userId}, #{prodName}, #{prodSize}, #{amount})
